comments.body: Is their anyway we could end up looking at the wrong image?

I double-checked this; it turns out one cannot overwrite the default registry in docker (moby/moby#7203), so this cannot happen.

(Except if someone replaces docker daemon by some "compatible" thing which does it differently. But then, there are probably no guarantees about anything...)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +570,574 @@                self.log("Check for docker.io image: %s" % repo_name)
                images = self._image_lookup(repo_name, tag)
                if len(images) == 0 and repo_name.startswith('library/'):
                    # Sometimes library/xxx images are not found
                    lookup = repo_name[len('library/'):]
